ygData.subject: Re: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Get a Giant Snake Fang as well.  Definitely the best newbie weapon in the game.  And the higher level piercers, IMO, appear to be better than the equivelant 1H
ygData.messageBody:
Get a Giant Snake Fang as well. Definitely the best newbie weapon in
the game. And the higher level piercers, IMO, appear to be better than
the equivelant 1H blunt.

--- Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...> wrote:
> From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>
>
> According to Hand of the Willow:
> > What is the next logical step beyond a cracked
> staff? I am a lvl 3 wizard (just started TZ) and am
> only familiar with the 2H blunt. What should I go
> for after the cracked?
>
> Nothing, at least for a while. Try to get a 1H blunt
> sometime, as there are
> nice items to hold in your off hand, but using a
> worn great staff or cracked
> staff will suffice for a while. Getting better
> weapons has a much lower
> priority than getting your next spell :)
>
